summary: Skyrim loader will help improve performance. Details inside.
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=#00b050][SIZE=7]SKYRIM LOADER[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=7][COLOR=#00b0f0]IMPROVE YOUR SKYRIM FPS[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR=#00b050][SIZE=7]
[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=5]HOW DOES IT WORK:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[SIZE=3][I][B]Skyrim Loader works by detecting the game path, detecting if skse is installed then loads the games and changes the games priority in windows to high. it also loads up another program that does the [/B][/I][B]\'Windows Media Player Trick\' [/B][I][B]this file is included in the download, but more information can be found [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5695]here[/URL]. [/B][/I]This was made for the reason of me not being bothered to run \'fps booster.exe\' then load skyrim. Now one click does it all![/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=3][I]
[/I][/SIZE][/B][B][SIZE=3][I]
[/I][/SIZE][/B][COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=5]KNOWN ISSUES:[/SIZE][/COLOR][B][B]
[/B][SIZE=3][I]Currently auto closing of loader, Priority change and FPS booster auto closing functions only work without SKSE. I am coding in vb.net so if anyone is interested in looking at my code([/I]I\'m self taught so it\'s sloppy[I]) [/I][/SIZE][/B][B][SIZE=3][I]
[/I][/SIZE][/B][COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=5]CREDITS:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ff0000][SIZE=5]
[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[B]Ceipher for [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5695]FPS BOOSTER[/URL][/B]
author: Happy-i-am
